text: This is a list of famous American painters. *Jean-Michel Basquiat (1960-1988) *George Caleb Bingham (1811-879) *Edward Hopper (1882-1967) *Lois Mailou Jones (1905-1998) *Georgia O'Keeffe (1887-1986) *Willem de Kooning (1904-1997) *Lee Krasner (1908-1984) *Jackson Pollock (1912-1956) *Lucas Reiner (born 1960) *Norman Rockwell (1894-1978) *James Rosenquist (1933-2017) *Mark Rothko (1903-1970) *Edward Ruscha (born 1937) *Frank Stella (1936-2024) *Andy Warhol (1928-1987) *Grant Wood (1891-1942) * Category:Lists of American people
title: List of American painters
